protein.general_function: Involved in transferase activity, transferring acyl groups, acyl groups converted into alkyl on transfer

pathway.name: Transfer of Acetyl Groups into Mitochondria

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring acyl groups, acyl groups converted into alkyl on transfer
